resources.string: Flutter has shown you ratings of over %d titles.

If you liked the app and wish to appreciate the developers\' efforts and support the app, you may choose to buy any of the following in-app purchases.\n\nThese packages do not unlock any features and you\'ll have all the features in the free version also.
